description:
Loplight is a twin-stick shooter taking inspirations from Hermetic lore and old alchemical concepts.
Explore the ruins of this world, find out who's responsible, and defeat the monstrous creatures blocking
your path.

STORY:
You are Edda, a young girl lost in a dying world.
The elements of the world have been unleashed, ancient demons stalk the lands.
Collect the pieces of Quintessence, ascend to a divine power, defeat the elder god
harvesting the souls of the world.

FEATURES:
■ Short but replayable story
■ High intensity combat, Dodge, Slash, and Shoot your way to victory!
■ Story Rich experience, explore the morality behind ambition and loneliness

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series Loplight
